description.ingredients.message: If you want to העלאה multiple images to צור your ווידאו, נא enable this button.

description.imageUrl.message: In tasks creating videos with multiple images, multiple images must be uploaded.

description.prompt.message: The פרומפט words for generating the Pixverse ווידאו

description.negativePrompt.message: Negative text פרומפט, optional, must not exceed 200 characters

description.uploadStartImage.message: העלאה the first פריים תמונה as a reference for generation; the final ווידאו will reference the first פריים.
description.uploadStartImage.description: Description of the העלאה reference פרמטר

description.seed.message: The Seed value for generating the ווידאו. If not set, a random Seed will be used.
